attributes.action: Give Gurkha Soldiers the same rights as a british soldier, the right to live in the UK and to join the Royal Hospital at Chelsea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give Gurkha Soldiers the same rights as a british soldier, the right to live in the UK and to join the Royal Hospital at Chelsea.  These Soldiers travel from impoverished Nepal to lay their lives on the line for Britian and Her Majesty, they are some of the most feared combatants in the world but yet the British Government treats them second rate!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
